alert.note: Alert for Northern La Porte (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued June 07 at 10:50PM EDT until June 08 at 5:00AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM EDT /4 AM CDT/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...High wave action, strong currents, and dangerous swimming conditions expected. Piers will be heavily swamped by waves. * WHERE...In Indiana, Northern La Porte county. In Michigan, Northern Berrien and Southern Berrien counties. * WHEN...Until 5 AM EDT /4 AM CDT/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Strong currents can pull swimmers into deeper water and high waves can sweep people off piers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wave heights 3 to 5 feet into late tonight with long wave periods that will be conducive to dangerous currents, especially on the north side of piers.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions. Do not venture out on piers.
